tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE research_data (
   id INT PRIMARY KEY,
   experiment_name VARCHAR(255),
   research_topic VARCHAR(255),
   researcher_name VARCHAR(255),
   experiment_date DATE,
   result TEXT
);

CREATE TABLE research_projects (
    project_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    project_name TEXT,
    project_description TEXT,
    start_date DATE,
    end_date DATE
)

CREATE TABLE experiments (
    experiment_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    project_id INT REFERENCES research_projects(project_id),
    experiment_name TEXT,
    experiment_description TEXT,
    experiment_date DATE,
    results TEXT
)

CREATE TABLE scientists (
    scientist_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    scientist_name TEXT,
    specialization TEXT,
    experience_years INT
)

CREATE TABLE publications (
    publication_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    project_id INT REFERENCES research_projects(project_id),
    scientist_id INT REFERENCES scientists(scientist_id),
    publication_title TEXT,
    publication_date DATE
)

CREATE TABLE experiments (
    experiment_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    idea_id INT,
    experiment_date DATE,
    result_text TEXT,
    result_measurements JSON
);

CREATE TABLE patents (
    patent_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    idea_id INT,
    patent_date DATE,
    patent_description TEXT,
    patent_owner TEXT
);

CREATE TABLE lab_notes (
    note_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    experiment_id INT,
    researcher_id INT,
    note_date DATE,
    note_text TEXT
);
